id: Trump: Turkish cleric Fethullah Gulen 'not under consideration' for extradition 'at this point'
paragraph: By Veronica Stracqualursi, CNNUpdated 1:41 PM ET, Sat November 17, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Washington (CNN)President Donald Trump said Saturday that he is not considering extraditing a Turkish cleric who has been blamed by Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan for a failed coup in 2016.CNN's  Amy La Porte, Ivan Watson and Gul Tuysuz contributed to this report.
